summary: This document contains a summary of account balances and transactions for Deutsche Bank Trust Company America, detailing significant deposits and withdrawals during September 2015. It highlights a large outgoing transfer of $4,250,000 and an incoming transfer of $2,500,000, indicating substantial financial activity related to the account.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer
events.description: A significant outgoing transfer of $4,250,000 was made from the account.

events.title: Incoming Money Transfer
events.description: An incoming transfer of $2,500,000 was credited to the account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3, St Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The document summarizes account balances for Deutsche Bank Trust Company America for September 2015.
The account had a beginning balance of $7,212,470.13 as of September 1, 2015.
A total of $2,500,000 was deposited into the account on September 28, 2015.
An outgoing transfer of $4,250,000 occurred on September 28, 2015.
Amanda Kirby is listed as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.
